item.title: Manchester United Owner Joins Bidding War for RCB and RR
item.description: Manchester United owner enters the fray to acquire RCB and RR, signaling potential changes in IPL ownership dynamics.

item.title: Manchester United Owner Among Bidders to Buy RCB
